alert.note: Alert for Pike; Scott (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 22 at 9:05PM CDT until April 24 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Valley City. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Valley City. * WHEN...Until Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The road to Norbut Fish and Wildlife area is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 13.8 feet and holding steady. - Forecast...The river is expected to hover near the 14.0 feet flood stage through midday Saturday. It is expected to slowly fall through the weekend and into next week. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Illinois River Valley City 14.0 13.8 Fri 8 pm 13.9 13.7 13.5 13.1 12.9 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
